alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Jefferson, northern Madison, Lanier, Lowndes and southeastern Brooks Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 542 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ray City to near Moody Air Force Base to near Lake Park to 7 miles southwest of Monticello. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Lake Park, Lakeland, Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Meigs, Dasher, Greenville, Barretts, Hamburg, Pinetta, Nash, Hansell, Drifton, Lovett, Nankin, Casa Blanco and Empress. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
